titleStmt.title: Whereas by our proclamation of the fifteenth day of August last, concerning the due payment of rents, quit-rents, and all other moneys payable to His Majestie, we gave such premonition to all persons concerned of the dangers that the failers therein would incurre ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Ormonde.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Crooke ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 5 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council chamber in Dublin the tenth day of April, 1663"--leaf [2]
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
